layout.singingstanza: Re -- joice in the Lord al -- ways; And a -- gain I say, re -- joice. Re -- joice in the Lord al -- ways; And a -- gain I say, re -- joice. Re -- joice, re -- joice, And a -- gain I say, re -- joice. Re -- joice, re -- joice, And a -- gain I say, re -- joice.

lyrics.stanza: Rejoice, rejoice, And again I say, rejoice. Rejoice, rejoice, And again I say, rejoice.
